description: This table contains information regarding related items for capture threshold.

columns.name: IMPLANT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the implant record.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A unique contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: LEAD_PSA_THRESH_R
columns.description: This item holds the lead PSA threshold for a related group.

columns.name: CAPTURE_THRESH_CMT
columns.description: This item holds the threshold comment for a related group.

columns.name: THRSHOLD_UNABLE_R_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item holds whether the threshold was able to be obtained for a related group.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: PCMKR_AT_LD_PLS_DUR
columns.description: This item holds the pulse duration for pacemaker atrial lead for a related group.
